attributes.name: invoiceId
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the invoice.

attributes.name: ownerId
attributes.description: Owner Id

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: Type a descriptive name for the invoice.

attributes.name: customerId
attributes.description: Select the customer account or contact to provide a quick link to additional customer details, such as account information, activities, and opportunities.

attributes.name: transactionCurrencyId
attributes.description: Choose the local currency for the record to make sure budgets are reported in the correct currency.

attributes.name: invoiceNumber
attributes.description: Shows the identifying number or code of the invoice.

attributes.name: isPriceLocked
attributes.description: Select whether prices specified on the invoice are locked from any further updates.

attributes.name: priceLevelId
attributes.description: Choose the price list associated with this record to make sure the products associated with the campaign are offered at the correct prices.

attributes.name: stateCode
attributes.description: Shows whether the invoice is active, paid, or canceled. Paid and canceled invoices are read-only and can't be edited unless they are reactivated.

attributes.name: createdOn
attributes.description: Date and time when the record was created.

attributes.name: createdBy
attributes.description: Shows who created the record.

attributes.name: modifiedOn
attributes.description: Date and time when the record was modified.

attributes.name: modifiedBy
attributes.description: Shows who last updated the record.

attributes.name: createdOnBehalfBy
attributes.description: Shows who created the record on behalf of another user.

attributes.name: modifiedOnBehalfBy
attributes.description: Shows who last updated the record on behalf of another user.

attributes.name: owningBusinessUnit
attributes.description: Unique identifier for the business unit that owns the record

attributes.name: owningUser
attributes.description: Unique identifier for the user that owns the record.

attributes.name: owningTeam
attributes.description: Unique identifier for the team that owns the record.

attributes.name: versionNumber
attributes.description: Version Number

attributes.name: emailAddress
attributes.description: The primary email address for the entity.

attributes.name: importSequenceNumber
attributes.description: Sequence number of the import that created this record.

attributes.name: overriddenCreatedOn
attributes.description: Date and time that the record was migrated.

attributes.name: timeZoneRuleVersionNumber
attributes.description: For internal use only.

attributes.name: UTCConversionTimeZoneCode
attributes.description: Time zone code that was in use when the record was created.

attributes.name: processId
attributes.description: Contains the id of the process associated with the entity.

attributes.name: stageId
attributes.description: Contains the id of the stage where the entity is located.

attributes.name: traversedPath
attributes.description: A comma separated list of string values representing the unique identifiers of stages in a Business Process Flow Instance in the order that they occur.

attributes.name: billToCity
attributes.description: Type the city for the customer's billing address.

attributes.name: billToComposite
attributes.description: Shows the complete Bill To address.

attributes.name: billToCountry
attributes.description: Type the country or region for the customer's billing address.

attributes.name: billToFax
attributes.description: Type the fax number for the customer's billing address.

attributes.name: billToLine1
attributes.description: Type the first line of the customer's billing address.

attributes.name: billToLine2
attributes.description: Type the second line of the customer's billing address.

attributes.name: billToLine3
attributes.description: Type the third line of the billing address.

attributes.name: billToName
attributes.description: Type a name for the customer's billing address, such as "Headquarters" or "Field office", to identify the address.

attributes.name: billToPostalCode
attributes.description: Type the ZIP Code or postal code for the billing address.

attributes.name: billToStateOrProvince
attributes.description: Type the state or province for the billing address.

attributes.name: billToTelephone
attributes.description: Type the phone number for the customer's billing address.

attributes.name: dateDelivered
attributes.description: Enter the date when the products included in the invoice were delivered.

attributes.name: description
attributes.description: Type additional information to describe the invoice, such as shipping details or product substitutions.

attributes.name: discountAmount
attributes.description: Type the discount amount for the invoice if the customer is eligible for special savings.

attributes.name: exchangeRate
attributes.description: Shows the conversion rate of the record's currency. The exchange rate is used to convert all money fields in the record from the local currency to the system's default currency.

attributes.name: discountAmountBase
attributes.description: Value of the Invoice Discount Amount in base currency.

attributes.name: discountPercentage
attributes.description: Type the discount rate that should be applied to the Detail Amount field, for use in calculating the Pre-Freight Amount and Total Amount values for the invoice.

attributes.name: dueDate
attributes.description: Enter the date by which the invoice should be paid by the customer.

attributes.name: freightAmount
attributes.description: Type the cost of freight or shipping for the products included in the invoice for use in calculating the total amount due.

attributes.name: freightAmountBase
attributes.description: Value of the Freight Amount in base currency.

attributes.name: lastBackofficeSubmit
attributes.description: Enter the date and time when the invoice was last submitted to an accounting or ERP system for processing.

attributes.name: opportunityId
attributes.description: Choose the opportunity that the invoice is related to for reporting and analytics.

attributes.name: paymentTermsCode
attributes.description: Select the payment terms to indicate when the customer needs to pay the total amount.

attributes.name: pricingErrorCode
attributes.description: Type of pricing error for the invoice.

attributes.name: priorityCode
attributes.description: Select the priority so that preferred customers or critical issues are handled quickly.

attributes.name: salesOrderId
attributes.description: Choose the order related to the invoice to make sure the order is fulfilled and invoiced correctly.

attributes.name: shippingMethodCode
attributes.description: Select a shipping method for deliveries sent to this address.

attributes.name: shipToCity
attributes.description: Type the city for the customer's shipping address.

attributes.name: shipToComposite
attributes.description: Shows the complete Ship To address.

attributes.name: shipToCountry
attributes.description: Type the country or region for the customer's shipping address.

attributes.name: shipToFax
attributes.description: Type the fax number for the customer's shipping address.

attributes.name: shipToFreightTermsCode
attributes.description: Select the freight terms to make sure shipping orders are processed correctly.

attributes.name: shipToLine1
attributes.description: Type the first line of the customer's shipping address.

attributes.name: shipToLine2
attributes.description: Type the second line of the customer's shipping address.

attributes.name: shipToLine3
attributes.description: Type the third line of the shipping address.

attributes.name: shipToName
attributes.description: Type a name for the customer's shipping address, such as "Headquarters" or "Field office",  to identify the address.

attributes.name: shipToPostalCode
attributes.description: Type the ZIP Code or postal code for the shipping address.

attributes.name: shipToStateOrProvince
attributes.description: Type the state or province for the shipping address.

attributes.name: shipToTelephone
attributes.description: Type the phone number for the customer's shipping address.

attributes.name: statusCode
attributes.description: Select the invoice's status.

attributes.name: totalAmount
attributes.description: Shows the total amount due, calculated as the sum of the products, discount, freight, and taxes for the invoice.

attributes.name: totalAmountBase
attributes.description: Value of the Total Amount in base currency.

attributes.name: totalAmountLessFreight
attributes.description: Shows the total product amount due, minus any discounts. This value is added to freight and tax amounts in the calculation for the total amount due for the invoice.

attributes.name: totalAmountLessFreightBase
attributes.description: Value of the Total Pre-Freight Amount in base currency.

attributes.name: totalDiscountAmount
attributes.description: Shows the total discount amount, based on the discount price and rate entered on the invoice.

attributes.name: totalDiscountAmountBase
attributes.description: Value of the Total Discount Amount in base currency.

attributes.name: totalLineItemAmount
attributes.description: Shows the sum of all existing and write-in products included on the invoice, based on the specified price list and quantities.

attributes.name: totalLineItemAmountBase
attributes.description: Value of the Total Detail Amount in base currency.

attributes.name: totalLineItemDiscountAmount
attributes.description: Shows the Manual Discount amounts specified on all products included in the invoice. This value is reflected in the Detail Amount field on the invoice and is added to any discount amount or rate specified on the invoice.

attributes.name: totalLineItemDiscountAmountBase
attributes.description: Value of the Total Line Item Discount Amount in base currency.

attributes.name: totalTax
attributes.description: Shows the total of the Tax amounts specified on all products included in the invoice, included in the Total Amount due calculation for the invoice.

attributes.name: totalTaxBase
attributes.description: Value of the Total Tax in base currency.

attributes.name: willCall
attributes.description: Select whether the products included in the invoice should be shipped to the specified address or held until the customer calls with further pick up or delivery instructions.

attributes.name: SLAId
attributes.description: Choose the service level agreement (SLA) that you want to apply to the invoice record.

attributes.name: SLAInvokedId
attributes.description: Last SLA that was applied to this invoice. This field is for internal use only.

attributes.name: onHoldTime
attributes.description: Shows the duration in minutes for which the invoice was on hold.

attributes.name: lastOnHoldTime
attributes.description: Contains the date time stamp of the last on hold time.

attributes.name: accountId
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the account with which the invoice is associated.

attributes.name: contactId
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the contact associated with the invoice.
